script.line: What the-- It didn't work!
Impossible! Minty must be so bereft of civic responsibility that it had no effect!
Bark! Bark!
She loves it! She embraces chaos!
I need to rethink my approach... How can I better convey the importance of safety..?
Hey! You still tryin' to catch that dog?
Doc Sandwich! You're back!
Yeah, sorry, don't mind me. I'm just passin' through. Quickest way back to my stall.
Doctor Sandwich!
Uh oh.
You were due at Security City TWO WEEKS AGO! And you never showed!
Oh my gosh! Doc Sandwich, did you commit a crime?
I mean, I don't know...
Oh yes. Doctor Sandwich transgressed at the grocery store...
When he brought SIX ITEMS to the FIVES ITEMS OR FEWER CASH!
Look, it was a loaf of bread, a slab o' ham, a head o' lettice, a jar o' mayo and two onions.
That is SIX ITEMS.
Were the two onions in one bag?
Yes!
It's SIX ITEMS. And for your delinquency...there will be consequences.
What, I gotta wear an onion hat or somethin'?
No. You must perform an act of community service...right now!
Catch that dog!
What!
Well, all right. Let's go, Minty. Round Two!
Bark, bark!
Yesss!
